reviews.name: Chase
reviews.title: but i was pretty confused for those 5 minutes
reviews.review: everything i read stated the delivery of the code would be instant. that was not the case for my order. it took some digging into a help article but in there i found that in some cases human verification of your order has to take place to assure fraud is not occurring. the process could take 4 hours. my verification only took about 5 mins. but i was pretty confused for those 5 minutes.woulda been nice to know about the verification thing ahead of time.but regardless of that, easy to buy and easy to redeem. i wanted to use my amex which nintendo doesnâ€™t accept. thanks for being open, amazon

reviews.name: RobinGB
reviews.title: Easy way to install on a Nintendo Switch
reviews.review: This is my son's preferred way to add money to his Nintendo Switch. We order it from Amazon and then he types in the code on his Switch immediately and he's good to go. Getting the code is a bit tricky if you don't know where to look on Amazon. You have to go to Your Orders but instead of the general orders you have to click on the tab that says Digital Orders. There you'll find two sets of numbers. It's the second number you want. We've bought this 'card' in several different increments and all have been great. If you want your child to buy able to purchase games but not have your credit card linked to his/her account, this is a good way to do it.

reviews.name: manmohan singh
reviews.title: I just purchased a code and when I entered it ...
reviews.review: I just purchased a code and when I entered it in my system it said that the code has already been used. I want my refund or another code this is bs.

reviews.name: Jo
reviews.title: Check your location before purchase
reviews.review: I am not able to use outside US and not able to get a refund

reviews.name: Bryan
reviews.title: Gift cards done right
reviews.review: What is there to say? Amazon money goes in, Nintendo money comes out. Codes are generally emailed instantly (aside from one case where I had to wait a little while and got my code within a couple hours).Protip: To deal with pesky cases where a game costs slightly more than your balance and adding another gift card would be wasteful, attempt to make the purchase anyway. On the screen where you're told you don't have enough money, there will be a button to press that will let you use a credit card to add the exact amount you need. I use this feature on the 3DS, but I believe the Wii U and Switch also have this feature.

reviews.name: cp
reviews.title: This is an excellent option as a gift for someone who owns a ...
reviews.review: Catch these on a rare discount and it's totally worth it otherwise it's the same as buying the same amount through your device. This is an excellent option as a gift for someone who owns a Nintendo device and you don't k ow what games they may want. If they're after a top teir game you may want to look at the 50 dollar option.

reviews.name: Sabrina
reviews.title: Is not redeemable after purchase, must wait days to redeem, this is inefficient.
reviews.review: buy this from in a store with the actual card instead so you can redeem it immediately.Amazon is horrible with digital services like this.

reviews.name: J. Sullivan
reviews.title: Instant Access to Redemption Code
reviews.review: I love being able to come onto Amazon and get a Nintendo eShop Gift Card at my convenience. This twenty dollar card is twice as awesome as was my ten buck card.I will certainly buy this simple to use eShop purchasing card again.

reviews.name: Michele J.
reviews.title: BEWARE OF THIEVES STEALING FOR THESE CODES
reviews.review: I did NOT place this order-my account was hacked and someone stole a gift card out of my account to make this purchase. I do NOT have a gaming system and have never purchased a game code but someone keeps stealing out of my account whenever I put a gift card into it. BEWARE that Amazon will not make amends when your account has been hacked! I did not use this code and never will.

reviews.name: Elizabeth A Holst
reviews.title: Code would not work
reviews.review: Avoid Digital downloads. First of all, my son did NOT intend to BUY the card. We requested a refund; no refunds on digital orders. When he went to enter the code into his Switch, he received the "this code has already been activated" message. He has learned several lessons - do not even LOOK at anything on Amazon. Do not PURCHASE digital downloads online. He is OUT $20.

reviews.name: Carlo del Mundo
reviews.title: Worked and a Great Value
reviews.review: The code was sent to me by email, and it worked! No hassle, no scratching anything off and ruining the code. Personally I've been rebuying a lot of the game I previously bought on Steam like Enter the Gungeon to play on the Switch and the portability of the system has gotten me to enjoy them a lot more (but I've progressively become more and more of a casual player as I've gotten a job). Definitely worth getting, especially if you have a micro sd card to the additional space.

reviews.name: Alyssa Lang
reviews.title: All ready redeemed
reviews.review: This is the second time we have bought a code and tried to use and said already redeemed. First time was at Christmas. I thought my son may have just did something wrong. This time i did it and got same error. Can not find anywhere to report to have it refunded and new card issued. Some things are just better at brick and mortar stores i guess. Save your self the headache and just pick one up when you go to any store or gas stations these days.

reviews.name: mr dead
reviews.title: Good option
reviews.review: So far I have bought these codes in 10$ and 5$ amounts. I believe $20 is the better option because Nintendo is fairly expensive compared to other gaming systems. For $20 you can get a decent game. I bought guns of Juarez. It's been a great game so far. But you would also have the option of picking out a number of games that are maybe not as great but likely still worth having

reviews.name: Llynns99
reviews.title: Good Gaming Purchase For The Gamer In My House
reviews.review: A purchase for my son and it works great to keep him gaming and happy. It also had a print link found in the Game Library so it would be a good gift option for giving, too.

reviews.name: Pily De LeÃ³n
reviews.title: Cancelar este pedido por favor
reviews.review: Necesito cancelar este pedido y no he podido, ya mi esposo lo comprÃ³ con otra tarjeta, gracias!

reviews.name: Eric D.
reviews.title: Immediate Delivery!
reviews.review: Why bother going to the store? The code comes immediately in your email (and Amazon messages). Best for people with AmEx/Discover as eShop doesn't take those. Figure a multi-million dollar company like Nintendo would take AmEx/Discover but sadly, no. Amazon does! No need to drive out to a store to get a code.

reviews.name: Jason R. Wilson
reviews.title: The only way to pay on the Nintendo Switch eShop!
reviews.review: I have difficulties leaving home, and the ability to be able to purchase virtual gift cards is very convenient for me. I have bought a lot of these over the last year with other gift card services, and have bought many games for my family and myself. It is a great product.

reviews.name: Alexander Gomez
reviews.title: Excelente
reviews.review: Muy buen producto, coloque el cÃ³digo y descargue el dlc sin ningÃºn problema. Muy recomendable

reviews.name: Rulk
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: I buy these whenever I need to buy a switch game. Get my 5% for the amazon card and I get a digital copy of the game. Love it!

reviews.name: Care455
reviews.title: Wow!!
reviews.review: My two boys love these cards. Perfect for keeping life going smooth sometimes and birthdays

reviews.name: Mike
reviews.title: Digital Codes FTW in a pinch..
reviews.review: Nothing saves your butt when you forgot about a coworkers' b-day like a quick access to a gift card code. Knowing we all had Switch units at home it was an easy choice and made me feel a lot less guilty. WOO

reviews.name: K. R.
reviews.title: First time to do this..
reviews.review: Wanted to add money to be able to purchase some games for my new 2DS. Didn't want to use my credit card, so I bought one of these codes. Was easy to do and in less than about two minutes I had $20 in my Nintendo account. Just followed the instructions on this page. Will be buying more of these.

reviews.name: Valerie Rohde
reviews.title: Wasn't what I wanted
reviews.review: I thought i was buy a gift card. Not an E card. I will have my grandson figure it out since it is for him. Is there no way to cancel it ?

reviews.name: An actual Human Being
reviews.title: Careful about digital codes
reviews.review: I would like to give this a glowing review but i question how Amazon obtains these e-codes, or maybe how Nintendo needs to keep track of them. I recently bought this for a friend of mine to beat a Black Friday sales for a game i know he wanted. A week later after using the code, his Nintendo account got hacked and was charged upwards of $300+. I know he never used e-codes until now since his Switch is fairly new. Just be wary of using digital codes in a time like this, look for the physical cards.

reviews.name: Derek B
reviews.title: Quick and easy
reviews.review: Using a credit card in the Nintendo store was down, so I used this instantly and was able to install the desired game.

reviews.name: Dallin
reviews.title: Instant purchase!
reviews.review: Got an email within 5 mins, after the order confirmation, with the digital code. Entering the code into the Nintendo store takes the longest time, but the overall experience is very fast! It's a great gift too - just print it out/email it and give the code to someone else.

reviews.name: Daniel Phillips
reviews.title: This gives 20 dollars.
reviews.review: I bought this and since I bought this I got twenty dollars to use whenever I want for the Nintendo e shop if you are looking to get 20 dollars for anything this is probably for you though if you are looking to get 50 for anything you could buy two of these and one ten but buying the 50 sounds a bit easier but this is a versatile purchase you can buy most indie titles or a third of a triple A game meaning that with three of these you could get a full triple A game good buy

reviews.name: Johnny Karate
reviews.title: Nintendo Prices are too High
reviews.review: Nintendo doesn't price match Amazon, as you might assume, so a game you can get here for $50 will be the full $60 on the Nintendo store - wish i could swap it for an Amazon card

reviews.name: Erika
reviews.title: Fast delivery
reviews.review: The digital code was emailed to me within 20 minutes of making the purchase. Fast delivery made this worth it! It saved me a trip to a store and it prevented me from having to enter my credit card number in the Nintendo eShop which I don't like doing.

reviews.name: Warthog
reviews.title: It's a code
reviews.review: Purchased this so I could get the expansion pack for Zelda both but I had to go out and purchase another since 19.99 after tax is more than this card.Still worked well even if I didn't get a larger amt. on the card.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: If it doesn't work? No refunds.
reviews.review: The code didn't work sooo what else to say? Props to Amazon of course, the code was available instantly, however the code failed to be redeemable on any of my Nintendo devices or via the Internet. This isn't the first instance this has happened for me, and I would caution anyone spending their money on this that it's not refundable should the code fail to work arbitrarily.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Was told it's a known issue digital Nintendo eshop cards do not work
reviews.review: Known issue that codes don't work. After driving 40 min to my back put money on just for the cards to find out it's a known issue that Nintendo cards do not work.Do not buy AMAZON knows they do not work but still keeps them listed and sells to unexpecting customers still regardless of the issue.So I can do another 1hr and 20 min round trip drive back to my bank or wait days for my money to be refunded to buy a game for my daughter.Thanks Amazon for misleading customers

reviews.name: Madison T. Edwards
reviews.title: Works With the Switch
reviews.review: I bought this for my son to buy games on his Nintendo Switch.The code was emailed to me and he applied it to his Nintendo account. It works great and took only about 10 minutes to buy and redeem. It's a very simple and easy process.

reviews.name: Guille RodrÃ­guez
reviews.title: Just an e-Gift Card, don't expect nothing else than the value
reviews.review: It's a Gift Card to add money to your account. It's instant. It's legit. Just don't type the wrong characters or share the email confirmation to anybody because it's final. The code works 100%.

reviews.name: Makay F
reviews.title: Trustworthy
reviews.review: I usually avoid digital goods from 3rd party sellers online, but I didn't have any issues with this order on Amazon. Paid, got the code shortly afterwards, and it worked fine

reviews.title: Took a while to get the code
reviews.review: Purchased from my Amazon app. It took me a while to get the actual code. You canâ€™t access it from the app or on email; you MUST log in from a desktop and go to Amazon Digital Downloads (took me a while to figure that one out.) After that it worked fine.

reviews.name: Usagi Lott
reviews.title: Digital e-shop card
reviews.review: Just what it says. It's a digital eShop card. I bought it as a gift and it worked no problem. You get the code via e-mail. So you or anyone you give the code to can use it.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.review: Worked great! I bought it as a gift for my nephew who lives in another country.My brother got him the Switch and set it up with his account here in the States but thought egift card codes wouldn't work, because apparently everyone has problems buying through the nintendo eshop out of the U.S.They use Amazon as the most reliable form for shopping in the Nintendo eshop, rather than buying it directly from them.ðŸ˜€

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: ok
reviews.review: ok

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.title: Grandson loves the eShop card
reviews.review: My grandson loves his switch and is always asking for a eShop card as payment for his chores rather than cash.He downloads the key numbers and is happy at his play.

reviews.name: Merwyden Suluai
reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.review: I love ordering these cards because they give my son the option of getting what he wants at the Nintendo Shop. It's delivered quickly and basically is a no hassle purchase. A win win.. for both my son & I. :)

reviews.name: A. Woods
reviews.title: It's money for the nintendo
reviews.review: What is there to say. It is a code for 20 dollars to put on your Nintendo switch account to buy games and stuff... Nuf said.

reviews.name: Sponzy
reviews.title: It worked well enough
reviews.review: Bought this for my friend for her birthday present, she is Canadian and it wouldn't work for her because apparently they are different for different countries. I should have done the research ahead of time, but I ended up using it for myself.

reviews.name: SSDDR
reviews.title: Nintendo money
reviews.review: Definitely beats trying to pay for games with beans? I dunno what else you could say reviewing this. Buy if you need to buy nintendo stuff

reviews.name: neudy moreno
reviews.title: muy util
reviews.review: practico

reviews.name: L.Kristi P.
reviews.title: Digitallychallenged grandma
reviews.review: I thought I ordered a regular gift card, something I could wrap and send to my grandson. I'm not sure how I'm going to give this...

reviews.name: FoxLove
reviews.title: got the code emailed right away
reviews.review: i was scared to buy this at first because of the 5% that gave it one star, afraid i was going to be in that five percent but i got it right away an the code worked

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.title: Great to be able to have these cards instead of using your money or credit card !!
reviews.review: Nice to be able to use this card instead of money , the kids love putting the card into their game system , they are young so they think itâ€™s fun .

reviews.name: Luis Ibrahim
reviews.title: It's money.
reviews.review: Came with the bundle but it's esentially money to use on the online shop. Good for digital games or the online susbcription service, you choose.

reviews.name: Kimrose
reviews.title: Worked fine, instant redemption, no issues!
reviews.review: My sons got one as a gift and then also purchased a couple with their "Amazon" gift cards. Both were easy to use right away.

reviews.name: Robert S.
reviews.title: Product fine...delivery method not!
reviews.review: I ordered this product expecting to receive it immediately but lo and behold it took hours for me to receive the code. I called customer service and the first explanation was that I had to wait for the purchase to clear the bank...this was paid for with an Amazon gift card. The product is fine, just was expecting to receive it instantly as stated on Amazon's page.

reviews.name: Kevin Smith
reviews.title: Buy card, check inbox, use code immediately at eshop purchase.
reviews.review: Great for buying games from Nintendo eShop on my phone. Buy while out for the day, use the redemption code while purchasing from the eShop 5 minutes later, and have the game downloaded by the time youâ€™re home.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Bit confused at first
reviews.review: It worked. Took me a few min. to figure out were the code was sent. I wish amazon would just show the code as soon as I finish checking out. But got all my funds so can't complain

reviews.name: Kathy A. Mayo
reviews.title: nintendo gift card
reviews.review: A nintendo gift card worked perfectly as a Christmas gift, for my grandson. He was able to type in the code for making a purchase of his favorite game on his switch device, instantly.

reviews.name: Mom of 2
reviews.title: Digital code. Not card.
reviews.review: It is a digital code. NOT a physical card. No good for gifts. Go to store and by an actual card.

reviews.name: Laura Deaton
reviews.title: Gift Cards
reviews.review: I was able to use these a few years ago.. I actually had to get a refund because the only Nintendo game I have is on android and uses another brand gift card.These always work otherwise and buying from Amazon is very easy.

reviews.name: Brian
reviews.title: Great digital gift card
reviews.review: Easy to purchase and use on my nintendo switch.I will buy more of these in the future!

reviews.name: Scienceguy
reviews.title: It is a gift card from nintendo.Nothing to see here.
reviews.review: I enjoy nintendo.This was a code sent by email.It worked.Nothing else to show you.

reviews.name: zague8
reviews.title: Efficiency guaranteed
reviews.review: We were in a rush at buying a game before my cousin left my house so he can download a game with Wi-Fi connectivity, so instead of placing my debit card at the Nintendo e-shop I got the idea of buying it at Amazon. It took less than a minute to buy, receive the code and redeem. That's what I call to be efficient with time and the whole process.

reviews.name: K. Hanson
reviews.title: You can't complain about it.
reviews.review: Exactly in the title you get the given amount you select in the nintendo's digital currency. To buy Anything in the Eshop.

reviews.name: DebG
reviews.title: great gift for 5 yr old grandgrandson
reviews.review: Momma says Praxton loves playing something called "Minecraft", i think that's right... :)

reviews.name: KSchwing
reviews.title: Easy and convenient
reviews.review: The code worked and was simple to use. Very convenient to purchase through Amazon and then utilize the sales Nintendo has at times from my Nintendo Switch.

reviews.name: Christopher
reviews.title: Great
reviews.review: Works thats all there is to know. Unlike my 2012 hyundai elantra. Put it in the shop today. Iâ€™m just sad is all. Idk....gonna cost a lot. Just wanted to vent. Card had 20$ value

reviews.name: Tammy
reviews.title: Perfect gift!
reviews.review: Love that I can buy these and just send the code to my nephew that lives out of state for him to use on his Nintendo switch!

reviews.name: Mortisha
reviews.title: Great Gift for My Grandson!
reviews.review: Awesome gift is gift cards! My grandson loved this and had no problem using it!

reviews.name: Lynn S
reviews.title: Good idea for teens
reviews.review: My grandson loves these for his birthday or Christmas, as they allow him to choose his present!I am glad I can order them from Amazon.

reviews.name: Lupe Hernandez
reviews.title: Great for 6 year old who wants to buy his own games
reviews.review: My son (6 yo) loves when he receives gift cards so he can buy the games he wants on the switch. Ofcourse we supervise him on what games he is allowed to play.

reviews.name: Leigha
reviews.title: Easy
reviews.review: Quick an easy way for my son to add money to play Fortnite. Code came to my email and also showed up right when I placed the order.

reviews.name: Stacey G-G
reviews.title: I buy these for my grandsons
reviews.review: I buy these for my grandsons, because I feel it's safer than giving out my credit or debit information.

reviews.name: JB
reviews.title: fast
reviews.review: Fast delivery and verification. Good save for that last minute gift idea.

reviews.name: Carrie Flock
reviews.title: eShop option a plus!
reviews.review: The $20 Nintendo wShop gift was a fast, convenient option for my sonâ€™s birthday while at college. I chose to purchase multiple gifts allowing him to customize his purchase when ready!

reviews.name: Marvin Carrillo
reviews.title: Fast and easy
reviews.review: Without an official store nearby this kind of gift card is a real life saver, code was delivered fast and it's really easy to put it on the estore

reviews.name: Mr. Shields
reviews.title: Quick & painless way to get eShop currency
reviews.review: Quick & painless way to get eShop currency... and a life saver for those who can't OR don't want to link their PayPal or CC/DC on their Nintendo account.

reviews.name: Juan Jose Cobo Ch
reviews.title: Gift to my nephew.
reviews.review: It worked fine! I bought it as a gift to my nephew. He's very pleased.

reviews.name: Allison
reviews.title: Easy
reviews.review: It came immediately to my inbox and I was able to print it out (along with instructions) so that I could present it as part of a gift without the inconvenience of going to a store and getting a gift card.

reviews.name: Ricardo
reviews.title: 5 Stars, Baby!
reviews.review: I received the code immediately after purchase. More importantly, this saves me a gas and a trip to GameStop. Thank you, Nintendo!

reviews.name: Mallory B
reviews.title: Code not card
reviews.review: Didn't realize it wasn't actually a card, just an electronic code. Bought this as a gift, so I ended up printing out the confirmation code and wrapping it to give it to the person lol

reviews.name: Travis White
reviews.title: Worked Perfect!
reviews.review: Loaded to my eShop account and worked without issue.Notification of code and ability to load it were swift and straightforward.

reviews.name: Craig Drachowski
reviews.title: I think I've been had!
reviews.review: I purchased 2 $20 cards for my nephew thinking that a physical "gift card " would be delivered to him. So far nothing and it's been a week and I don't have any "code " to speak of to redeem it! I'm starting to think that I was just screwed out of $40!!!

reviews.name: Delenia M. Hayes
reviews.title: eShop gift card
reviews.review: It was for part of my grandson's birthday and he enjoyed it very much.

reviews.name: Bubbaa
reviews.title: Fast, Easy and Reliable
reviews.review: This worked flawlessly.I bought this for my nephewâ€™s Nintendo Switch.The whole process from buying the eCash to adding the money to the Seitch took less than 5 minutes.

reviews.name: S. M. Perez
reviews.title: Itâ€™s a gift card
reviews.review: Daughter used this to buy a video game for her switch. I know nothing about it but apparently it works great.

reviews.name: Ken
reviews.title: Takes a while to enter
reviews.review: Takes a while to figure how to enter it.Does not seem to be a way to enter in on the website so you have to use the switch and controllers to enter the long string.

reviews.name: braxton
reviews.title: Reliable
reviews.review: Code worked fine without any troubles at all. Not much to it. Was a great spend

reviews.name: Ezekiel
reviews.title: Fast service!
reviews.review: I immediately received the code after I bought it! Great service!

reviews.name: Kaleb
reviews.title: It works. The end.
reviews.review: Pretty decent. Super fast and Super simple. Always room for improvement but I can't think of anything that would make it better. I'm NOT rating it based off of how good it was but how satisfied I was at the end (was the outcome good or bad). Again super simple. You buy it, you receive the code at your email, then you use said code.

reviews.name: Corey S
reviews.title: Easy way to get Nintendo eshop credit with cards/methods that Nintendo eshop doesn't support
reviews.review: The only reason I bought this on Amazon is because the Nintendo eshop doesn't take Discover. Amazon does, so I got it here and redeemed it instantly.

reviews.name: Eric H.
reviews.title: Works great, super convenient
reviews.review: Super convenient to buy my eShop cards digitally from Amazon.

reviews.name: Ashley Stuckey

reviews.review: Very easy to purchase for my son to use on his switch!!!

reviews.review: I like the ease of acquiring the item and I used it for purchases on the Nintendo eshop

reviews.name: jessi Thompson

reviews.review: Digital code was delivered quickly and worked great.

reviews.name: charlene h.
reviews.title: taxes on games
reviews.review: what i do not like is buying these in the set denominations.. I buy them for my grandsons and when they pay for their game items there is tax. So it leaves them off by anywhere from needing $1.00 -3.Or leaving a little left on a card that is not usable. They do not add up with the games. Should be able to buy any denomination. cost me way more buying things this way.

reviews.name: Assunta
reviews.title: Cash to the Eshop is the prefect gift for anyone with a Nintendo Switch!
reviews.review: $20 bucks to the digital Nintendo store will always be a much appreciated gift!

reviews.name: Minimalist

reviews.name: Lisandra
reviews.title: Buena compra
reviews.review: Buena compra
